fr.sorbonne_u.cps.map.components

Class MapComponent<K extends java.io.Serializable,V extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.cps.map.components.MapComponent<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, MapImplementationI<K,V>

    public class MapComponent<K extends java.io.Serializable,V extends java.io.Serializable>
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements MapImplementationI<K,V>
    The class MapComponent implements a hash map component that offers map services through the component interface MapI.

    Description

    This is just a basic example aiming at showing how to use the plug-in facility of BCM. Hence, the hash map component simply uses the standard Java hash map class to implement its services. Indeed, the advantage of this component is to make possible to have a distributed hash map, as BCM components can be distributed. There is no need to use a thread safe implementation of the hash map as long as the component has only one thread because BCM components with a single thread serialises the execution of their services.

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2019-03-21

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
